Get Metadata from all your blogs built by blogdown

Jiaxiang Li

2018-11-10

Source: vignettes/blogdown_meta.Rmd
blogdown_meta.Rmd

When you post a lot for your blog site built by blogdown, you may want to merge, edit metadata of some of them. The function blogdown_meta go deeper in the yaml contents of each .Rmd and build a friendly readable data.frame to analyze. This function is inspired by function count_yaml in the package blogdown.

library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(add2blog)
blogdown_meta(dir = '.')

Developed by Jiaxiang Li.

Site built with pkgdown.
